Currently, there is such a situation that we are very upset by the work of the AliExpress trading platform. The fact is that dishonest people have taken control of the Russian segment of AliExpress. The dollar to ruble exchange rate on AliExpress is more than 20% higher than the market rate, and the possibility of paying in dollars is disabled. Thus, goods have become very expensive for us. These dishonest people pocket 20% of all the money that Russian customers spend on AliExpress. I am sure that this is an unfortunate misunderstanding, and not the official policy of the Alibaba Group.
